action_list.description: This action will scale in jenkins slaves by given scale in count
action_list.name: ScaleIn

action_list.description: This action will scale out jenkins slaves by given scale out count
action_list.name: ScaleOut

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

wget http://apache.uvigo.es/activemq/5.15.9/apache-activemq-5.15.9-bin.tar.gz
tar zxvf apache-activemq-5.15.9-bin.tar.gz

sudo mv apache-activemq-5.15.9 /usr/local/activemq
sudo chmod 755 /usr/local/activemq/bin/activemq
sudo chown root:root -R /usr/local/activemq

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
sudo ln -s /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-*/ /usr/jdk8
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget curl vim
sudo yum clean packages
sudo yum clean headers
sudo yum clean metadata
sudo yum clean all

WqbtDyAQ/CNU77n67e7yj9+brKSWCsNoPGDmOmKFAvarWXSr198KRx4MUO3r/KYT
JP0tzdWVPZZ029z31dV3Zhjo18oycE+BAoIBAQCWf168XcWfzbi2OYXH9wp/z/Jq
7HAXhmf1dLi7Po40zLXyGSuvrM9vX8avEfrFKd/vDXtrAw8F6kVzn6FQsYODy7h/
+hJhgW02pm6Cf3bOlmicqf6eCYQu690UWVLUG4sadpSyatH92hhb0mXBNkXU1buK
CXKadyPCIpm3S3TC1//YuDjye8NX3bdAt1f2Z0xEY5w48K5pvwShD26FWbI+uB1v
XmcG8oZF2k7QW6OAgIjg4OihTycFhsM7to/OxICMQGh7HpZ1MsOSdhYuu+CMnth4
brRL+1Zs/NnaKTVqL5/ERMXCpHtVVA/bgCjvb+NgbLZ6t/YzmjzN0SiAU05L
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----" >> id_rsa
sudo chmod 600 id_rsa

echo "ssh-rsa  ebejerenau@EBEJERENAU10" >> id_rsa.pub 
sudo chmod 600 id_rsa.pub

echo "Copiando fichero wso2 ..."

scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@10.22.21.132:/opt/workspace/provisioning/wso2esb-5.0.0.zip /tmp

echo "Descomprimiendo el fichero tar ..."
sudo yum install -y unzip
cd /opt
sudo unzip /tmp/wso2esb-5.0.0.zip

cd /opt/wso2esb-5.0.0/bin

sudo sed -i '1iexport JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8' wso2server.sh

sudo chmod +x /opt/wso2esb-5.0.0/bin/wso2server.sh

cd

sudo echo "[Unit]
Description=wso2: Enterprise server bus service
Documentation=https://wso2.com/

[Service]
ExecStart=/bin/bash /opt/wso2esb-5.0.0/bin/wso2server.sh
Restart=always
StartLimitInterval=0
RestartSec=10

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" > wso2server.service

sudo mv wso2server.service /etc/systemd/system/

sudo chmod 755 /etc/systemd/system/wso2server.service

sudo systemctl daemon-reload

sudo systemctl enable wso2server.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd ~/.ssh/

echo '@@{AUTHORIZED_KEY}@@' >> authorized_keys
sudo chmod 600 authorized_keys

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
sudo ln -s /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-*/ /usr/jdk8
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo groupadd tomcat
sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/tomcat
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat tomcat

cd /tmp && sudo wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.5.30/bin/apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
sudo tar -zxvf apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
cd /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30
sudo sed -i'.orig' 's/52428800/1073741824/g' /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/webapps/manager/WEB-INF/web.xml
sudo mv /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/* /usr/local/tomcat/
sudo chown -R centos:centos /usr/local/tomcat
sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/tomcat/bin/*.sh

sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/ /opt/apache-tomcat-8.5.30
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/webapps /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV/

echo '[Unit]
Description=Apache Tomcat Web Application Container
After=syslog.target network.target

[Service]
Type=forking
SuccessExitStatus=143

Environment=JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8
Environment=JRE_HOME=/usr/jdk8/jre
Environment=CATALINA_PID=/usr/local/tomcat/temp/tomcat.pid
Environment=CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment=CATALINA_BASE=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment='CATALINA_OPTS=-Xms512M -Xmx1024M -server -XX:+UseParallelGC'
Environment='JAVA_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom'

ExecStart=/usr/local/tomcat/bin/startup.sh
ExecStop=/bin/kill -15 $MAINPID

User=tomcat
Group=tomcat

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee -a /etc/systemd/system/tomcat.service

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tomcat-users xmlns="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml tomcat-users.xsd"
        version="1.0">
        
            <role rolename="manager"/>
            <role rolename="manager-gui"/>
            <role rolename="manager-status"/>
            <role rolename="manager-script"/>
            <role rolename="admin"/>
            <role rolename="admin-gui"/>
            <role rolename="admin-script"/>
            <role rolename="manager-jmx"/>
            <user username="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMIN}@@'" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-script,admin,admin-gui,admin-script,manager-script,manager-status,manager-jmx" />
            <user username="'@@{TOMCAT_USER}@@'" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-status" />
            
</tomcat-users>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
        <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
        <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
  <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
  <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /usr/local/tomcat

sudo systemctl start tomcat.service
sudo systemctl enable tomcat.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp/
sudo wget http://10.22.21.137/repo/soft/Vending/incms-vending-server.war

sudo mv /tmp/incms-vending-server.war /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV/webapps/
sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /soflib00

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

export CATALINA_BASE=/soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV
sudo systemctl restart tomcat.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp/
sudo wget http://10.22.21.137/repo/soft/batch/scriptsBatch.tar.gz

sudo tar -xvf /tmp/scriptsBatch.tar.gz
sudo chmod a+x /tmp/batch/*.sh

sudo mv /tmp/batch/setEnv.sh /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/bin/
sudo mv /tmp/batch/*.sh /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/bin/batch/

sudo chown icdesa3:icdesa -R /soflib00
sudo chown icdesa3:icdesa -R /bdatos00

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo mkdir -p /bdatos00/desarrollo/inCMS3/Files
sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/bin/batch/
sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/batchlib
sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/properties

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo groupadd icdesa
sudo useradd -m -g icdesa -s /bin/bash icdesa3
sudo mkdir -p /home/icdesa3/logs
sudo chown icdesa3:icdesa -R /home/icdesa3/logs

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo groupadd tomcat
sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/tomcat
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat tomcat

cd /tmp && sudo wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.5.30/bin/apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
sudo tar -zxvf apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
cd /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30
sudo sed -i'.orig' 's/52428800/1073741824/g' /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/webapps/manager/WEB-INF/web.xml
sudo mv /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/* /usr/local/tomcat/
sudo chown -R centos:centos /usr/local/tomcat
sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/tomcat/bin/*.sh

sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/ /opt/apache-tomcat-8.5.30
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/webapps /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV/

echo '[Unit]
Description=Apache Tomcat Web Application Container
After=syslog.target network.target

[Service]
Type=forking
SuccessExitStatus=143

Environment=JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8
Environment=JRE_HOME=/usr/jdk8/jre
Environment=CATALINA_PID=/usr/local/tomcat/temp/tomcat.pid
Environment=CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment=CATALINA_BASE=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment='CATALINA_OPTS=-Xms512M -Xmx1024M -server -XX:+UseParallelGC'
Environment='JAVA_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom'

ExecStart=/usr/local/tomcat/bin/startup.sh
ExecStop=/bin/kill -15 $MAINPID

User=tomcat
Group=tomcat

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee -a /etc/systemd/system/tomcat.service

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tomcat-users xmlns="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml tomcat-users.xsd"
        version="1.0">
        
            <role rolename="manager"/>
            <role rolename="manager-gui"/>
            <role rolename="manager-status"/>
            <role rolename="manager-script"/>
            <role rolename="admin"/>
            <role rolename="admin-gui"/>
            <role rolename="admin-script"/>
            <role rolename="manager-jmx"/>
            <user username="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMIN}@@'" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-script,admin,admin-gui,admin-script,manager-script,manager-status,manager-jmx" />
            <user username="'@@{TOMCAT_USER}@@'" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-status" />
            
</tomcat-users>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
        <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
        <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
  <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
  <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo groupadd tomcat
sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/tomcat
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat tomcat

cd /tmp && sudo wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.5.30/bin/apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
sudo tar -zxvf apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz

sudo sed -i'.orig' 's/52428800/1073741824/g' /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/webapps/manager/WEB-INF/web.xml
sudo mv /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/* /usr/local/tomcat/
sudo chown -R centos:centos /usr/local/tomcat
sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/tomcat/bin/*.sh

sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web
sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/ /opt/apache-tomcat-8.5.30
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/webapps /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web/
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/webapps /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/

echo '[Unit]
Description=Apache Tomcat Web Application Container
After=syslog.target network.target

[Service]
Type=forking
SuccessExitStatus=143

Environment=JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8
Environment=JRE_HOME=/usr/jdk8/jre
Environment=CATALINA_PID=/usr/local/tomcat/temp/tomcat.pid
Environment=CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment=CATALINA_BASE=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment='CATALINA_OPTS=-Xms512M -Xmx1024M -server -XX:+UseParallelGC'
Environment='JAVA_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom'

ExecStart=/usr/local/tomcat/bin/startup.sh
ExecStop=/bin/kill -15 $MAINPID

User=tomcat
Group=tomcat

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee -a /etc/systemd/system/tomcat.service

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tomcat-users xmlns="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml tomcat-users.xsd"
        version="1.0">
        
            <role rolename="manager"/>
            <role rolename="manager-gui"/>
            <role rolename="manager-status"/>
            <role rolename="manager-script"/>
            <role rolename="admin"/>
            <role rolename="admin-gui"/>
            <role rolename="admin-script"/>
            <role rolename="manager-jmx"/>
            <user username="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMIN}@@'" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-script,admin,admin-gui,admin-script,manager-script,manager-status,manager-jmx" />
            <user username="'@@{TOMCAT_USER}@@'" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-status" />
            
</tomcat-users>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
        <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
        <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
  <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
  <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /usr/local/tomcat

sudo systemctl start tomcat.service
sudo systemctl enable tomcat.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp/
sudo wget http://10.22.21.137/repo/soft/ClienteLigero/icDesa3Web.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.137/repo/soft/Servidor%20Web/icDesa3.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.137/repo/soft/AdministratorWEB/incms-administration-icDesa3.tar.gz

sudo tar -xvf incms-administration-icDesa3.tar.gz
sudo mv incms-administration-icDesa3 /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web/webapps/

sudo mv /tmp/icDesa3Web.war /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web/webapps/
sudo mv /tmp/icDesa3.war /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/webapps/

sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /soflib00

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget curl vim
sudo yum clean packages
sudo yum clean headers
sudo yum clean metadata
sudo yum clean all
